ModMetaData.name: Stonecutting Extended
ModMetaData.author: Scherub
ModMetaData.description:
This mod adds learning XP for stonecutting again, as well as bulk recipes, cutting three chunks at once.
Features:
- Adds bulk bills: 3 chunks at once - Allows you to gain XP again - Adjustable Work Amount - Select Artistic, Construction or Crafting as used skill
Supported Mods:
The following stone block mods are supported: - Alpha Biomes - CCP's Stone Tweaks - Cupro's Stones - Gulden Biome - [K]Extra Stone - [K]Extra Stone(w/ Cupro's Textures) - RimNauts
